001package com.commercetools.graphql.api.client;
002
003import com.netflix.graphql.dgs.client.codegen.GraphQLQuery;
004import java.lang.Override;
005import java.lang.String;
006import java.util.HashSet;
007import java.util.Set;
008
009/**
010 * StandalonePrices are managed and queried through the StandalonePrices API
011 * and associated to a ProductVariant through the sku field.
012 */
013public class StandalonePriceGraphQLQuery extends GraphQLQuery {
014  public StandalonePriceGraphQLQuery(String id, String key, String queryName,
015      Set<String> fieldsSet) {
016    super("query", queryName);
017    if (id != null || fieldsSet.contains("id")) {
018        getInput().put("id", id);
019    }if (key != null || fieldsSet.contains("key")) {
020        getInput().put("key", key);
021    }
022  }
023
024  public StandalonePriceGraphQLQuery() {
025    super("query");
026  }
027
028  @Override
029  public String getOperationName() {
030     return "standalonePrice";
031                    
032  }
033
034  public static Builder newRequest() {
035    return new Builder();
036  }
037
038  public static class Builder {
039    private Set<String> fieldsSet = new HashSet<>();
040
041    private String id;
042
043    private String key;
044
045    private String queryName;
046
047    public StandalonePriceGraphQLQuery build() {
048      return new StandalonePriceGraphQLQuery(id, key, queryName, fieldsSet);
049               
050    }
051
052    /**
053     * Queries with specified ID
054     */
055    public Builder id(String id) {
056      this.id = id;
057      this.fieldsSet.add("id");
058      return this;
059    }
060
061    /**
062     * Queries with specified key
063     */
064    public Builder key(String key) {
065      this.key = key;
066      this.fieldsSet.add("key");
067      return this;
068    }
069
070    public Builder queryName(String queryName) {
071      this.queryName = queryName;
072      return this;
073    }
074  }
075}
